org.resthub.oauth2.provider.service
Class AuthorizationServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.resthub.core.service.GenericServiceImpl<Token,TokenDao,java.lang.Long>
      org.resthub.oauth2.provider.service.AuthorizationServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
GenericService<Token,java.lang.Long>, AuthorizationService
public class AuthorizationServiceImpl
extends GenericServiceImpl<Token,TokenDao,java.lang.Long>
implements AuthorizationService

Authorization service implementation. Relies on an list of AuthenticationProvider services. This Spring beans is declared within XML configuration files.

generateToken

@Transactional(readOnly=false)
public Token generateToken(java.util.List<java.lang.String> scopes,
                                         java.lang.String clientId,
                                         java.lang.String clientSecred,
                                         java.lang.String userName,
                                         java.lang.String password)
Generates a new access token for a given user and for given scopes.

This method is used to generate access tokens in the gant type "Resource Owner Basic Credentials".

If no user account is found for these credentials, an error is raised.

Specified by:
generateToken in interface AuthorizationService
Parameters:
scopes - List of objet names the client will access with the token. Could be empty, but not null.
clientId - The client unic identifier. Not used now, must be null.
clientSecred - The client shared secret. Not used now, must be null.
userName - The user account's user name.
password - The user account's password.
Returns:
The generated token.

getTokenInformation

public Token getTokenInformation(java.lang.String accessToken)
Retrieves all infromation (rights, lifetime, etc...) related to an access token

Specified by:
getTokenInformation in interface AuthorizationService
Parameters:
accessToken - The access token found.
Returns:
The corresponding token, or null if the access token is not found.
